content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: PMDTC
      operator: non_empty
    - name: PMDTC
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value:
        - USUBJID
        - PMTESTCD
        - PMORRES
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.191
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when there is more than one record present for any particular
  Palpable Mass test per Palpable Mass test in the PM Domain, for a subject on a particular
  date.
Outcome:
  Message: The palpable mass test and result is not unique for this subject and date/time.
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
    - PMTESTCD
    - PMORRES
    - PMDTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '191'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: One record per test per palpable mass per observation
                  time per subject
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.910
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - PM

json.Description: Raise an error when there is more than one record present for any particular Palpable Mass test per Palpable Mass test in the PM Domain, for a subject on a particular date.

Outcome.Message: The palpable mass test and result is not unique for this subject and date/time.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: One record per test per palpable mass per observation time per subject
